original_text: They, and all that appertained to them, went down alive into the pit, and the earth closed upon them: and they perished from among the congregation.
korean_text: 그들과 그의 모든 재물이 산 채로 스올에 빠지며 땅이 그 위에 덮이니 그들이 회중 가운데서 망하니라

sentences.original_text: They, and all that appertained to them
went down alive into the pit
and the earth closed upon them
and they perished from among the congregation
